<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Oil of Mending](/Equipment.aspx?ID=178)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Oil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=121" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 561 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 9 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="" /><row>1 minute (Interact)</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A vial of _oil of mending_ appears to have countless translucent threads swirling within. Applying this oil to an item casts a 2nd-level [_mending_](/Spells.aspx?ID=189) spell to repair the item.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
